front.name: Emotion
front.desc:
Oracle cards can answer questions.
Use these cards to answer what someone is feeling, or what emotion a thing or event would spark.

back.name: Admiration
back.desc:
Admiration, Trust, or Acceptance.
When mixed with Ecstacy, yields Love.
When mixed with Terror, yields Submission.
